channel.title: Amsterdam Release on Keep calm and Write something
channel.description: Recent content in Amsterdam Release on Keep calm and Write something

item.title: ONAP Takes Flak as Telcos Prep for Release 1 | Light Reading
item.description:
1st release

Amsterdam release which is due to November 16

Critics

It will not be stable enough to be used for product

misunderstanding

That release will focus on providing support for three network functions or services – a virtual firewall (vFW), virtual customer premises equipment (vCPE) and a voice-over-LTE service running on a virtual evolved packet core (vEPC)

I think this is a misunderstanding. These are just an use case not the ONAP supports them only. Maybe that can be interpreted ONAP is verified for this cases. But still it does not mean ONAP supports only them
